summary: K9 Security Training and Seasonal Tournaments testing complete. All backend APIs pass (25/25 tests). Frontend code correctly structured with K9Training page having skill tree UI, TrainingCenter filtering out security level, and Leaderboard showing tournament banner.
passed_tests: GET /api/training/lessons - Returns 90 total lessons (200 OK)
GET /api/training/lessons?level=security - Returns 15 K9 lessons (200 OK)
K9 lesson IDs are k9_001 to k9_015
K9 lessons token costs all between 18-25 tokens
K9 lessons have badge_reward field
K9 lessons are in k9_protection category
K9 lessons have all required fields (lesson_id, title, description, level, category, difficulty, token_cost, duration_minutes, steps, tips, order)
GET /api/tournaments/current - Returns active Winter Guardian Championship (200 OK)
Tournament has k9_protection theme
Tournament has correct prize structure (1st: 150, 2nd: 75, 3rd: 35, top_10: 15 tokens)
Tournament has leaderboard array
Tournament has days_remaining field
Tournament scoring is k9_training
GET /api/tournaments/my-position - Correctly requires authentication (401)
GET /api/tournaments/history - Correctly requires authentication (401)
Beginner lessons exist with 6-8 token costs
Intermediate lessons exist with 9-11 token costs
Advanced lessons exist with 12-15 token costs
Expert lessons exist with 14-15 token costs
GET /api/training/lessons/k9_001 - Returns K9 Foundation lesson (200 OK)
GET /api/training/lessons/k9_015 - Returns Master Certification lesson (200 OK)
GET /api/training/lessons/k9_999 - Returns 404 for non-existent
GET /api/ - Root shows 90 lessons_count
Navigation has 'K9 Security' link with Shield icon at /k9-training
K9Training.jsx has skill tree UI with 5 tiers and tier progression
TrainingCenter.jsx correctly filters out security level lessons
Leaderboard.jsx has tournament-banner with data-testid

features_verified.navigation: K9 Security link with Shield icon at /k9-training

seed_data_creation: None required - uses existing static TRAINING_LESSONS and SEASONAL_TOURNAMENTS data
context_for_next_testing_agent: K9 Security Training and Seasonal Tournaments fully implemented. Backend: 90 total lessons (75 regular + 15 K9 security), /api/training/lessons?level=security returns 15 K9 lessons with costs 18-25 tokens, /api/tournaments/current returns active seasonal tournament (Winter Guardian in Dec-Feb). Frontend: K9Training.jsx has 5-tier skill tree, TrainingCenter.jsx filters out security level, Leaderboard.jsx shows tournament banner when active. Protected routes redirect correctly. Navigation has K9 Security with Shield icon.
